body:
$SPY $AAPL $TQQQ $VZ $AMZN  
 
Coming into 2022, we anticipated more volatility and headwinds during H1, that breed dip buying opportunities for savvy and long-term investors. Active portfolio managers likely do better than passive portfolio managers in 2022.   
  
With such an outlook, and having positioned for such an environment in Q4 2021,  dip buying opportunities and market volatility are easy to act upon. Drawdowns are the expectation for long-term holdings in the interim. EQ over IQ sets the stage for an easily executable game plan. Up you win, down you win eventually.   
  
I bought hella TQQQ right out of the gate this morning. Again, lower is better, and still actionable. Added SBUX, PYPL and recaptured, but flipped AAPL. Shorted VXX for another profitable trade on the day and took profits on long-term holdings in VZ, after already qualifying for dividend 2/2

$SPY $AMZN $AAPL $TSLA 

Two words : 

BEARS ARE FUK
$INTC what’s Gregory M. Bryant next stop $AMD or $AAPL ?
Apple in serious talks with MLB to broadcast games $AAPL https://nypost.com/2022/01/10/apple-in-serious-talks-with-mlb-to-broadcast-games/

links.title: Apple in serious talks with MLB to broadcast games
links.description: Apple has had substantial talks about carrying Major League Baseball games next season, The Post has learned. If a deal is finalized, it would represent a significant milestone in sports broadcasting since Apple has long been looked upon as a potential stop for major sports TV rights.

body: $AAPL $QQQ $AMD $TSLA I’ve been saying that all along. There have always been higher interest rates and tech has kicked ass. We’ve been living in a fantasy land for almost two years. I’ve had mortgage rates of 16%. We are just getting back to normal. By the way, value stocks can’t thrive without tech.

message.body: $AAPL $QQQ $AMD $TSLA Who cares about Fed rate-hikes. Over the last 3 decades of hiking rates period, Tech still outperforms. Now is the perfect time to BUY THE DIP ! All this sell-off is just panic selling and pricing in 4 rate hikes and balance sheet this year. This means any worse news about inflation, market already priced in. On the other hand, if CPI is below expected, market will rally like no tomorrow. Market swings fast just like today. People that sell at dips, well don't expect to ride any gains lol.
